document.heading: Community Renewable Energy Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-47, the “Community Renewable Energy Amendment Act of 2013,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-57. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2013, and Oct. 1, 2013, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 17, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 20-186 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-47 became effective on December 13, 2013.
